sections.description:
A Wordpress plugin that connects to OpenAI to generate an image description for your media library attachments.

Installation

  1. Download the plugin from the GitHub repository.
  2. Log in to your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  4. Click on the Upload Plugin button, and choose the downloaded zip file.
  5. Click on Install Now and then Activate.

Updating Settings

  1. Go to Settings > Image Alt Boy.
  2. Enter your OpenAI API Key.
  3. Click on Save Changes.

Generating Image Alt Description

  1. Navigate to your media library click on the image you wish to generate a meta description for and click the Generate Alt Description button.
